mapper.select: select /* MainManage.Space.getMyActionList - 내 활동 내역 목록을 조회한다. */ a.we_wiki_idx as idx , b.we_wiki_title as title , a.we_ins_date as insDate , case when a.we_wiki_action_type = 'I' then '입력' when a.we_wiki_action_type = 'U' then '수정' end as actionType from ( select we_wiki_idx , we_user_idx , max(we_wiki_revision) as we_wiki_revision , we_wiki_action_type , max(we_ins_date) as we_ins_date from we_wiki_log group by we_wiki_idx, we_user_idx, we_wiki_action_type ) a, we_wiki b where a.we_wiki_idx = b.we_wiki_idx and a.we_user_idx = #{weUserIdx} and b.WE_USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY a.we_ins_date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT a.we_wiki_idx , b.we_wiki_title , a.cnt FROM ( SELECT we_wiki_idx , COUNT(we_wiki_idx) AS cnt FROM we_favorite WHERE we_wiki_idx IS NOT NULL AND WE_USE_YN = 'Y' AND we_use_yn="Y" GROUP BY we_wiki_idx ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 5 ) a INNER JOIN we_wiki b ON a.we_wiki_idx = b.we_wiki_idx and b.WE_USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT we_wiki_idx , we_wiki_title , we_wiki_agree FROM we_wiki WHERE we_wiki_status='S' AND we_use_yn='Y' ORDER BY we_wiki_agree DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT b.we_user_nick , b.we_user_idx , a.we_point FROM we_profile a INNER JOIN we_user b ON a.we_user_idx = b.we_user_idx WHERE a.we_point > 10 ORDER BY a.we_point DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT a.we_wiki_idx , a.we_wiki_title , a.we_wiki_view_cnt FROM we_wiki a INNER JOIN we_space b ON a.we_space_idx=b.we_space_idx WHERE b.we_view_privacy='ALLGROUP' AND a.we_wiki_status='S' AND a.we_use_yn='Y'
ORDER BY we_wiki_view_cnt DESC
ORDER BY a.we_ins_date DESC
LIMIT 4;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM we_wiki WHERE we_wiki_status='S' AND we_use_yn='Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM we_wiki_tag WHERE we_use_yn='Y'

SELECT count(a.we_target_user_idx) AS CNT FROM we_add_friend a, we_user b, we_profile c WHERE a.we_target_user_idx = b.we_user_idx AND b.we_user_idx = c.we_user_idx AND a.we_use_yn = 'Y' AND c.we_away_yn = 'N' AND a.we_user_idx = #{userIdx}

select count(a.we_user_idx) AS CNT from we_add_friend a, we_user b, we_profile c where a.we_user_idx = b.we_user_idx and b.we_user_idx = c.we_user_idx and a.we_use_yn = 'Y' and c.we_away_yn = 'N' and a.we_target_user_idx = #{userIdx}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.we_bbs_idx , a.we_space_idx , a.we_bbs_title , DATE_FORMAT(a.we_ins_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS we_ins_date , a.we_ins_name , a.we_hit_count FROM we_bbs a, we_space b WHERE a.we_space_idx = b.we_space_idx AND b.we_space_exposed = 'Y' AND a.we_use_yn = b.we_use_yn AND b.we_view_privacy = 'ALLGROUP' AND a.we_use_yn = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT a.we_bbs_idx , a.we_space_idx , a.we_bbs_title , DATE_FORMAT(a.we_ins_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS we_ins_date , a.we_ins_name , a.we_hit_count FROM we_bbs a, we_space b, we_space_user c WHERE a.we_space_idx = b.we_space_idx AND b.we_space_exposed = 'Y' AND a.we_use_yn = b.we_use_yn AND b.we_view_privacy = 'USER' AND a.we_space_idx = c.we_space_idx AND c.we_view_permit = '1' AND c.we_user_idx = #{weUserIdx} UNION ALL SELECT a.we_bbs_idx , a.we_space_idx , a.we_bbs_title , DATE_FORMAT(a.we_ins_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS we_ins_date , a.we_ins_name , a.we_hit_count FROM we_bbs a, we_space b, ( SELECT d.* FROM we_group_user c, we_space_group d, we_group_info e WHERE 1 = 1 AND c.we_use_yn = 'Y' AND c.we_group_idx = d.we_group_idx AND c.we_group_idx = e.we_group_idx AND d.we_view_permit = '1' AND c.we_user_idx = #{weUserIdx}) c WHERE a.we_space_idx = b.we_space_idx AND b.we_space_exposed = 'Y' AND a.we_use_yn = b.we_use_yn AND b.we_view_privacy = 'GROUP' AND b.we_space_idx = c.we_space_idx ) t1 ORDER BY we_ins_date DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{endRow}
